text: 7.5: Jol 2.16; Sek 7.3; 1 Te 3.5Nde maaŋ muuŋgip, mani gu muuiŋ warir rɨgip, nde kɨr wari ga sɨv, the won fhavar the kirpɨgɨ thari. Khueŋ guigira, ŋko maaŋ muuŋgip wani ga suaŋgip ndava bavira kɨv, tuga tɨvaneŋra Fhe Bakɨme phorgɨp suan saŋv wani phorgɨ ku thamtharga, ne nzerara. Ŋko maaŋ muuŋgip, ŋko zumgum wom wani phorgɨ kuri. Ŋko muuŋv kɨv, ŋko nuanira tuituigip wani won vuzvugi ganɨnga fhuv, Satan zɨv ŋkon mpararim, ŋko rɨgɨrga.
